data.name: AboutPage_AboutDescription
data.value: A combination of a Windows service and a touch interface optimized GUI to increase your handheld gaming computer experience. Features include: motion control a.k.a. gyro control, virtual controller simulation, quick tools overlay, virtual touchpads, 3D controller model, per application based profile settings system. Handheld Companion relies on ViGEmBus driver and ViGEmClient libraries as well as HidHide kernel-mode filter driver. Motion control algorithms are based on work by Jibbsmart and availible information on the GyroWiki.

data.name: ControllerPage_UncloakOnCloseDesc
data.value: Restore visibility of all physical controllers when application is exited

data.name: SettingsMode0_AimingDownSightsDesc
data.value: An additional motion sensitivity multiplier when aiming down sights or scope through the use of the configured activation button

data.value: Change the steering deadzone, in degree. Improves steering straight

data.name: SettingsMode1_MaxSteeringAngleDesc
data.value: Change the maximum steering angle value, in degree

data.name: SettingsMode1_SteeringLinearityDesc
data.value: Mapping between input and steering. Lower values provide more accuracy near full lock but less accuracy near the center. Higher values provide more accuracy near the center but less accuracy near full lock. 1.0 is a linear mapping

data.name: ServiceDescription
data.value: Provides gyroscope and accelerometer support to Windows handheld gaming computers through a virtual controller. If the service is enabled, embedded controller will be cloaked to applications outside the whitelist. If the service is disabled, embedded controller will be uncloaked and the virtual controller disabled.

data.name: SettingsPage_ForceVirtualControllerOrderDesc
data.value: Forces the virtual controller to be detected as first controller during Windows start. Enable this if your app/game doesn't detect your inputs (requires device reboot).

data.value: You might want to hide your physical controller or mute your virtual controller.

data.name: ControllerPage_PhysicalControllerNotHiddenDesc
data.value: Your physical controller is not hidden, yet you have an unmuted virtual controller. You might encounter double inputs in games.

data.name: AutoRollYawSwapDesc
data.value: This input will operate as a simple joystick. Ideal for laptop and clamshell type handhelds, automatic yaw roll swap based on how device is being held (90 or 180 degree open).

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.Default
data.value: This is your default controller profile. This profile will be applied for all your applications that do not have a specific profile. Some options requiring an executable might be disabled.

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.MissingExecutable
data.value: Oops. It seems this profile does not have an executable. How is this even possible?

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.MissingPath
data.value: Oops. It seems this profile does not have a path to the application. Some options requiring an executable might be disabled.

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.MissingPermission
data.value: Oops. It seems you do not have the necessary permission level to modify the content of this application. Make sure you have started this program in administrator mode.

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.Running
data.value: Oops. It seems this profile excutable is running. Some options requiring an executable might be disabled.

data.name: JoystickCameraDesc
data.value: This input will operate as a simple joystick. This is intended for traditional joystick applications

data.name: JoystickSteeringDesc
data.value: This input will operate as a joystick optimized for controlling a steering wheel or a racing game

data.name: PlayerSpaceDesc
data.value: This input will operate as a joystick optimized for controlling a first or third person camera

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.IsRunning
data.value: Oops. This profile seems to be running. Some options requiring an executable may be disabled.
